new_role_classes.label: AI-Assisted Engineer
new_role_classes.definition: A professional engineer who integrates artificial intelligence tools into their practice to augment design, analysis, or documentation processes while maintaining responsible charge over outputs
distinguishing_features: Uses AI software as productivity tools
Must verify and validate AI-generated outputs
Maintains professional judgment over AI recommendations
Responsible for quality assurance of AI-assisted work
new_role_classes.professional_scope: Engineering design, analysis, and documentation with AI tool integration
typical_qualifications: Domain expertise in relevant engineering field
Understanding of AI tool capabilities and limitations
generated_obligations: Maintain responsible charge over all outputs
Understand limitations of AI tools used
new_role_classes.examples_from_case: Engineer A using AI drafting tools and language models for report generation
new_role_classes.source_text: Engineer A opted to use open-sourced artificial intelligence (AI) software to create an initial draft

role_individuals.name: Engineer A
active_obligations: Maintain responsible charge over work products
ethical_tensions: Technical competence vs. reliance on AI tools
Efficiency vs. thorough review of AI outputs
Client confidentiality vs. AI data exposure
role_individuals.case_involvement: Primary engineer retained to prepare report and design documents, chose to use AI tools
role_individuals.source_text: Engineer A, an environmental engineer with several years of experience and holding a professional engineering license

role_individuals.name: Engineer B

attributes.previous_role: mentor and supervisor to Engineer A

active_obligations: Previously provided guidance and QA reviews
role_individuals.case_involvement: Former mentor whose retirement created a gap in Engineer A's quality assurance process
role_individuals.source_text: Engineer A had relied on guidance and quality assurance reviews by their mentor and supervisor, Engineer B

role_individuals.name: Client W
ethical_tensions: Trust in engineer vs. need to verify work quality
role_individuals.case_involvement: Retained Engineer A, provided project information, reviewed and identified issues in deliverables
role_individuals.source_text: Client W to prepare a comprehensive report addressing the manufacture, use, and characteristics
